name: 3 days Conquer Tay Con Linh Mount
description: Mount Tay Con Linh is located at the west of Ha Giang province. It stretches from Hoang Su Phi to Vi Xuyen district. Although it is not the highest mountain in Vietnam but not easy to conquer compare to the highest Fansipan because not only of the distance but also it is not shaped the road to there yet.
